definition: to know whether others are cold or hot (idiom)/to be very considerate
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Men less money is not important, find a Zhilengzhire hurts you.
sentences.chinese: 男人錢多錢少不重要，找一個知冷知熱疼你的。

sentences.english: His wife is taking good, and thorough care of him.
sentences.chinese: 妻子對他照顧得無微不至，知冷知熱的。
